entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
